description: The perfect place to store your extra dishes and china, the Jefferson cabinet from Pure Snuggle will add convenience and style to your kitchen area. Crafted of engineered wood, the cabinet features two large sliding doors that reveal interior shelving.

description: The Dressing Table is made of the finest quality Laminated board. Best quality melamine paper is used to make furniture scratch-free and glossy. Melamine paper is pasted by heat pressed machine which enhances the durability of the board as well as furniture. Most of our furniture is made of natural components, which will have natural differences in grain construction and occasional minor blemish.

description: Aged Leather Desk Chair. Swivels 360 degrees. Adjustable height. Perfect for home office, work office or reception area. Made in beautiful full-grain aged South American leather.
notice: Available nationwide from our furniture store to your home. Please enquire for pricing.

description: This double vanity set is just what you need to add a clean-lined, French country looks to your main bathroom or guest bath. It's made from solid and engineered wood with a crisp neutral finish, and it's built on a plinth-style base. The 60 inch wide surface accommodates the two oval undermount ceramic sinks (included), as well as soap dispensers and toothbrush holders. This vanity set has four cabinet doors and six soft-close drawers with inset paneling, and they open up to reveal room for cleaning supplies, toiletries, and makeup. Plus, this vanity set arrives fully assembled.
notice: (Amount Inclusive of all applicable taxes and delivery charges)

description: The generous size of this dining set is suitable for any room of a house or furniture. The elegant appearance of wood makes it a good choice for your room decoration
notice: (Amount Inclusive of all applicable taxes and delivery charges)

description: The hand-fabricated legs are made from 100x100mm box steel which is 3mm thick. Each foot is 150x150mm and 8mm thick whilst the 50x25mm box steel top frame ensures that the 25mm thick timber sits perfectly flat. Each foot comes with felt pads to protect your floor. Each leg includes a perforated panel as standard. Optional extras include a desktop mounted partition with monitor mounting rail.
notice: Amount Inclusive of all applicable taxes and delivery charges. We can deliver to the local area (within a 12-mile radius)

description: This industrial style multi drawer storage cabinet comes with a glass door and plenty of metal drawers. Most of the shelves are made of wood. It supplies lots of storage space for all the bits and bobs, such as paint brushes, paint pots, CD, sewing kits etc. The design is very unique and will definitely add character to your Office!  If you want to get your office highly organize, give this unit a try. By collecting things that you love, that are authentic to you, your office becomes your story!
